channel.title: Nemesis::::Re-Written::::Updated!::::70+ updates!
channel.description:
Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn't fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server. Check out pics: DHALLY IS WAY TO SLOW, so I can't catch both hits, because it lags a little bit too.
DDS Spec: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img74.imageshack.us/img74/9620/doublespec1fn7.png[/img][/URL]
Maul Spec: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/2827/doublespec2jj2.png[/img][/URL]
1. Selected NEW starting source 2. Added forums. (Won't post unless I get permission) 3. Full Specials 4. Double Damage -DDS spec! 5. Almost all skills work, including: Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Hitpoints Agility Thieving Crafting Fletching Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Slayer-Horrible, just kill NPC's, no missions or anything
6. Added the best welcome screen possible. 7. ELEMENTAL ROBES 8. FULL Edgeville 9. FULL Fally 10. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!) 11. Figher Torso Minigame 12. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!) 13. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.) 14. Almost NO lag! 15. Double Maul special! 16. Double Dragon Hally special! 17. New client 18. Better background 19. SKULLING!!! 20. Need to use client, or you can't see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls! 21. Fixed "Female Bug" 22. User Profiles 23. Fixed Med Helms and Cloaks 24. Removed EXP from any object 25. EXTREMELY challenging training, 55 EXP per hit. I.E, you hit a 10, you get 550 exp. 26. Train at Slayer Tower as a beginner, Crawling Hands hit a max of 3. 27. ::Jad to get to him. (Portal wasn't working). 28. Added NPC hitting, so they hit randomly between their max 29. Jad-IMPOSSIBLE to SOLO, need at least 3-4 people on him. 30. Jad's hit ranges from 40-91, and he always hits above 40, never seen anything under. 31. Fixed a lot of weapon bonuses 32. Added in CORRECT Bronze-Barrows gloves 33. Killing the monsters in the Slayer Tower gives 80 Slayer EXP per hit. 34. Need 85 Slayer to get to Abyssal Demons 35. Abyssal Demons RARELY drop a whip, 1/20 chance, and hit up to 40. 36. Removed Elemental Robes-EXTREMELY GAY 37. Removed about 280 KB of un-needed NPCs.. 38. Removed all training commands 39. Removed all commands 40. Noclip totally fucks your account, credits to Legend! 41. When you use cat, it doesn't spawn a cat, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense 42. When you mass click, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense 43. Added an animation for DDS special. *Needs tested* 44. Added requirements to monsters for Slayer 45. From 1-15 Slayer, kill Crawling Hands 46. 15-?? (need to finish it) kill Banshees 47. Need to add a new place with lvl 30-85 Slayer monsters lol. 48. Added in FULL Slayer Tower 49. Finished lvls 15-30 on the bottom floor 50. Added in full requirements for Slayer 51. If you attack a NPC, without required Slayer, you get an error, and it sends you a message. 52. KBD has a 1/50 chance for Dmed and other various rune items 53. KQ has a 1/100+ chance of dropping a Chain, 2H, or Med 54. Greater Demon HARDLY drops Dlong, Dscimmy, or med 55. Lesser Demon drops nothing 56. All other dragons drop pretty much nothing 57. Best item available in the stores is rune, need to get a better economy 58. Deleted Dragon Shop 59. Deleted God Store 60. Lowered the EXP rate (now stands at 90) 61. Added in working Slayer-(I didn't have time to test, it should work) 62. Noclip does the following:Resets your bank, -500M exp to all skills, saves stats, and disconnects you. 63. Cat does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine 64. Massing does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine 65. Re-added pass encryption (If you can't remember your own password, your own damn fault) 66. Added in Guthan Set effect, random chance of healing 67. Made all barrows drops 1/20+ chance 68. Jad officially is unable to solo, he has like 300 HP, and is always hitting a 50+, good luck! 69. Finally port-forwarded 70. No-IP needs to be tested 71. Client is 100% done, blue skulling with a white square (I'll have better ones in the future) 72. Reduced some lag 73. Took out over 200KB again out of my client.java, of un needed material 74. Need to add random drops to the following: Bronze-Steel dragons 75. Fixed every hood/med helm. 76. Fixed all blocking animations for players who use shields 77. 100% Slayer Tower 78. Get an error when you attack NPCs without required Slayer<-Need to fix. 79. Sends you a message saying "You need ** Slayer to slay *name*" 80. Added in "Spikey Chains" to teleport you up floors 81. Added in doors, so they teleport you when you click on them 82. Fixed MAX hits for all NPCs that are in the server 83. Fixed HP on Crawling Hands, some were over 500 HP, and it took forever to kill them 84. Abyssal Demons drop the 3rd rarest item IN GAME<-Abyssal Whip 85. KQ drops the rarest item IN GAME<-Dragon Chainbody 86. KBD drops the 2nd rarest item IN GAME<-Dragon legs 87. Removed partyhats for a while 88. Removed ::pure 89. Removed ::master 90. Fixed Dragon's dying emotions 91. Need to fix Greater and Lesser demon wince emotions 92. Need to add in a spell to take you to KQ 93. Need to add in KQ dying emotion
Update Log: June 29-July 1-20 updates July 4-53 updates-I need a life.. buying life 500k pl0x.. ;)

item.title: Nemesis::::Re-Written::::Updated!::::70+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Thanks. I’m waiting for the real “Tree” on MoparScape-Help to “ban” me on these forums for doing nothing, even on different forums. Gl “Tree.”[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 11:15:06 PM[/size][hr]Now server has 70+ updates, by the way it’s coming along, it’ll be up in no time!

Read full topic

item.title: Nemesis::::Re-Written::::Updated!::::70+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz R E B 0 R N 0wnz
item.description:
@R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz wrote:

Nice job Fr33b1e im yogily off moparscape-help just to tell you. and wow you’ve gotten alot of things done, nice job on the server! Still cant wait till its out :|. well keep up your amazing work ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Nemesis::::Re-Written::::Updated!::::70+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

You may get it by playing it when I put it up. I’ll probably never release this, and if I do, I’m putting a big anti-leach in it, but it won’t be until I have 10K+ char files, which I don’t plan on for a few months. I’ll constantly be updating the server. I’m nearly done with random drops for Bronze-Steel Dragons, but I’m really tired.

Read full topic

item.title: Nemesis::::Re-Written::::Updated!::::70+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn’t fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server.
Check out pics: DHALLY IS WAY TO SLOW, so I can’t catch both hits, because it lags a little bit too.

DDS Spec:

Maul Spec:

  1. Selected NEW starting source

  2. Added forums. (Won’t post unless I get permission)

  3. Full Specials

  4. Double Damage -DDS spec!

  5. Almost all skills work, including:
    Attack
    Strength
    Defence
    Range
    Prayer
    Magic
    Runecrafting
    Hitpoints
    Agility
    Thieving
    Crafting
    Fletching
    Smithing
    Fishing
    Cooking
    Firemaking
    Slayer-Horrible, just kill NPC’s, no missions or anything

  6. Added the best welcome screen possible.

  7. ELEMENTAL ROBES

  8. FULL Edgeville

  9. FULL Fally

  10. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!)

  11. Figher Torso Minigame

  12. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!)

  13. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.)

  14. Almost NO lag!

  15. Double Maul special!

  16. Double Dragon Hally special!

  17. New client

  18. Better background

  19. SKULLING!!!

  20. Need to use client, or you can’t see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls!

  21. Fixed “Female Bug”

  22. User Profiles

  23. Fixed Med Helms and Cloaks

  24. Removed EXP from any object

  25. EXTREMELY challenging training, 55 EXP per hit. I.E, you hit a 10, you get 550 exp.

  26. Train at Slayer Tower as a beginner, Crawling Hands hit a max of 3.

  27. ::Jad to get to him. (Portal wasn’t working).

  28. Added NPC hitting, so they hit randomly between their max

  29. Jad-IMPOSSIBLE to SOLO, need at least 3-4 people on him.

  30. Jad’s hit ranges from 40-91, and he always hits above 40, never seen anything under.

  31. Fixed a lot of weapon bonuses

  32. Added in CORRECT Bronze-Barrows gloves

  33. Killing the monsters in the Slayer Tower gives 80 Slayer EXP per hit.

  34. Need 85 Slayer to get to Abyssal Demons

  35. Abyssal Demons RARELY drop a whip, 1/20 chance, and hit up to 40.

  36. Removed Elemental Robes-EXTREMELY GAY

  37. Removed about 280 KB of un-needed NPCs…

  38. Removed all training commands

  39. Removed all commands

  40. Noclip totally fucks your account, credits to Legend!

  41. When you use cat, it doesn’t spawn a cat, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense

  42. When you mass click, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense

  43. Added an animation for DDS special. Needs tested

  44. Added requirements to monsters for Slayer

  45. From 1-15 Slayer, kill Crawling Hands

  46. 15-?? (need to finish it) kill Banshees

  47. Need to add a new place with lvl 30-85 Slayer monsters lol.

  48. Added in FULL Slayer Tower

  49. Finished lvls 15-30 on the bottom floor

  50. Added in full requirements for Slayer

  51. If you attack a NPC, without required Slayer, you get an error, and it sends you a message.

  52. KBD has a 1/50 chance for Dmed and other various rune items

  53. KQ has a 1/100+ chance of dropping a Chain, 2H, or Med

  54. Greater Demon HARDLY drops Dlong, Dscimmy, or med

  55. Lesser Demon drops nothing

  56. All other dragons drop pretty much nothing

  57. Best item available in the stores is rune, need to get a better economy

  58. Deleted Dragon Shop

  59. Deleted God Store

  60. Lowered the EXP rate (now stands at 90)

  61. Added in working Slayer-(I didn’t have time to test, it should work)

  62. Noclip does the following:Resets your bank, -500M exp to all skills, saves stats, and disconnects you.

  63. Cat does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine

  64. Massing does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine

  65. Re-added pass encryption (If you can’t remember your own password, your own damn fault)

  66. Added in Guthan Set effect, random chance of healing

  67. Made all barrows drops 1/20+ chance

  68. Jad officially is unable to solo, he has like 300 HP, and is always hitting a 50+, good luck!

  69. Finally port-forwarded

  70. No-IP needs to be tested

  71. Client is 100% done, blue skulling with a white square (I’ll have better ones in the future)

  72. Reduced some lag

  73. Took out over 200KB again out of my client.java, of un needed material

  74. Need to add random drops to the following: Bronze-Steel dragons

  75. Fixed every hood/med helm.

  76. Fixed all blocking animations for players who use shields

  77. 100% Slayer Tower

  78. Get an error when you attack NPCs without required Slayer<-Need to fix.

  79. Sends you a message saying “You need ** Slayer to slay name”

  80. Added in “Spikey Chains” to teleport you up floors

  81. Added in doors, so they teleport you when you click on them

  82. Fixed MAX hits for all NPCs that are in the server

  83. Fixed HP on Crawling Hands, some were over 500 HP, and it took forever to kill them

  84. Abyssal Demons drop the 3rd rarest item IN GAME<-Abyssal Whip

  85. KQ drops the rarest item IN GAME<-Dragon Chainbody

  86. KBD drops the 2nd rarest item IN GAME<-Dragon legs

  87. Removed partyhats for a while

  88. Removed ::pure

  89. Removed ::master

  90. Fixed Dragon’s dying emotions

  91. Need to fix Greater and Lesser demon wince emotions

  92. Need to add in a spell to take you to KQ

  93. Need to add in KQ dying emotion

June 29-July 1-20 updates
